content: संभवः {@--1@} Birth, production, springing up, arising, existence; प्रियस्य सुहृदो यव मम तत्रैव संभवो भूयात् <ls>Māl. 9</ls>; मानुषीषु कथं वा स्यादस्य रूपस्य संभवः <ls>Ś. 1. 26</ls>; <ls>Bg. 3. 14</ls>; <ab>oft.</ab> at the end of <ab>comp.</ab> in this sense; अप्सरः संभवैषा <ls>Ś. 1.</ls> {@--2@} Production and bringing up; <ls>Ms. 2. 227</ls>; (see <ls>Kull.</ls> thereon). {@--3@} Cause, origin, motive. {@--4@} Mixing, union, combination. {@--5@} Possibility; संयोगो हि वियोगस्य संसूचयति संभवं <ls>Subhāṣ.</ls> {@--6@} Compatibility, consistency. {@--7@} Adaptation, appropriateness. {@--8@} Agreement, conformity. {@--9@} Capacity. {@--10@} Equivalence (one of the Pramāṇas). {@--11@} Acquaintance. {@--12@} Loss, destruction.
